edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.queues

Class ArrivalHall

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.airport_customs.queues.ArrivalHall
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TransitSystem

    public class ArrivalHall
extends java.lang.Object
implements TransitSystem
    Class representing the arrival hall in our airport customs simulator. This class is responsible for housing the passengers once they have de-planed from ArrivingAirplanes and helping passengers pass from the arrival hall to their respective customs desks
    Version:
    2.0 (February 16, 2015)
    Author:
    Adams Ombonga (amombong)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ArrivalHall(int numPassengers, CustomsDesk[] desks)
      Constructor method for Arrival hall that accepts a number of passengers and an array of customs desks as parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int departTimeNext()
      Method used to determine when the front passenger in the queue will leave the arrival hall.
      boolean hasNext()
      Method used to determine if there a passengers to still be processed
      Passenger processNext()
      Method used to send the passenger in the front of the line the signal to get in a customs desk line.
      int size()
      Method used to determine the remaining amount of passengers in the queue

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ArrivalHall

        public ArrivalHall(int numPassengers,
                   CustomsDesk[] desks)
        Constructor method for Arrival hall that accepts a number of passengers and an array of customs desks as parameters. Using these parameters passengers are generated and placed in a waiting line queue for the arrival hall
        Parameters:
        numPassengers - number of passengers in the simulation (user-entered)
        desks - array of various passengers customs desks (user-entered)

    • Method Detail

      • size

        public int size()
        Method used to determine the remaining amount of passengers in the queue
        Specified by:
        size in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        the remaining size of the passengers queue

      • hasNext

        public boolean hasNext()
        Method used to determine if there a passengers to still be processed
        Specified by:
        hasNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        true if the queue still has passengers

      • processNext

        public Passenger processNext()
        Method used to send the passenger in the front of the line the signal to get in a customs desk line. That passenger is the removed from the arrival hall queue
        Specified by:
        processNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        passenger at the front of the queue who is to be processed

      • departTimeNext

        public int departTimeNext()
        Method used to determine when the front passenger in the queue will leave the arrival hall. Return Integer.MAX_VALUE if the line is empty
        Specified by:
        departTimeNext in interface TransitSystem
        Returns:
        when the time when current passenger will leave the arrival hall, return Integer.MAX_VALUE if the line is empty
